a7010a1b-f865-44c6-8b99-ba3b1248b7c3: At 3rd level, when a divine hunter hits a creature with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g}, she grants her allies within 10 feet of her the benefit of the Precise Shot {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} against that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Her allies must remain within 10 feet of her, and must be able both to see and hear the divine hunter to gain this benefit.
6f6a578a-bb11-4412-bb20-6e3eda3c4b6c: When an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against an opponent that you also {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threaten{/g}, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against that opponent.
4b7c860f-fee4-4982-a071-c917f7a15a51: When you are adjacent to one or more allies who also have this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} per such ally (maximum +4).
e8e26619-8993-407e-8c8e-842fa82c8714: Whenever you and an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanking{/g} the same creature, you deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of precision {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}. This bonus damage stacks with other sources of precision damage, such as sneak attack. This bonus damage is not multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
3d4db4eb-2ff5-4988-8bfe-284e3ed555c3: Whenever you and an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanking{/g} the same creature, your flanking {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} increases to +4. In addition, whenever you score a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against the flanked creature, it provokes an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} from your ally.
09984ae2-044d-4e44-bed2-6aa4ed9ba655: Whenever you are adjacent to an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you receive a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}Combat Maneuver Defense{/g}. This bonus increases to +4 if the creature attempting the {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} is larger than both you and your ally.
189ac618-529d-4b7c-976e-0aced6078521:
Whenever you are wielding a shield and are adjacent to an ally wielding a shield who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} from your shield increases, depending on the shield wielded by your ally.
If your ally is wielding a buckler or a light shield, your shield bonus increases by +1.
If your ally is wielding a heavy shield or a tower shield, your shield bonus increases by +2.
7753e2e5-5b3c-4e73-a468-78fbcba4c4ec:
With the aid of an ally, you are skilled at piercing the protections of other creatures with your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you are adjacent to an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you receive a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} and level {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}.
c5dce295-407e-490a-97b9-6015a73647a9:
You are skilled at working with your allies to perform dangerous {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you are adjacent to an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you receive a +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all combat maneuver {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. This bonus increases to +4 when attempting to break free from a grapple.
de008a8a-31c6-4dc7-80da-1737f877d63e:
You have trained to work in ranks of archers to rain arrows down upon your foes.
Benefit: You gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} rolls for each ally with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} who made a ranged attack since the end of your last turn against a target within 15 feet of your target, to a maximum of +4.
de38a457-9e2f-4a6f-8952-614d859d0369:
You know how to work together to trip your foes.
Benefit: Whenever you attempt a trip {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} against an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened{/g} by an ally with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice and take the better result.
9e4d4b4a-40ec-4dea-a2d0-dcab4b92668d:
Your allies cover you while you cast complicated {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you are adjacent to an ally who also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you receive a +4 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
If your ally is wielding a buckler or a light shield, this bonus increases by +1.
If your ally is wielding a heavy shield or a tower shield, this bonus increases by +2.
2ac001a4-559e-46c1-9a3b-163fd3ee02bd:
Your ally's eyes are your own, and yours are his.
Benefit: While you are {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanked{/g} and adjacent to an ally with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, you receive a +2 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from opponents flanking you.
f4ee2127-c734-4843-9195-58a20db48ae0:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with your chosen weapon leaves opponents unable to defend themselves if you strike them when their defenses are already compromised.
Benefit: Any {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}, or panicked opponent hit by you this {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} until the end of your next turn. This includes any additional attacks you make this round.
